metadata.title: CVE-2015-3254 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The client libraries in Apache Thrift before 0.9.3 might allow remoteauthenticated users to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion) viavectors involving the skip function.

criterions.comment: thrift-compiler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
